markdownRemark.html:
Chasing the impossible creates opportunities.

The pursuit of impossible dreams have allowed curiosity to evolve to reality. The world we live in now is built with the crazy minds that imagined possibility at first.

For my own experiences I did learn the following because my decision to take a leap of faith two years ago..
